post.description: Upload one or more images using multipart/form-data. Accepts up to 12 image files (JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP) with a maximum size of 5MB each. Use field name 'images' for the file uploads.

images.description: Image files to upload. Supports JPEG, PNG, GIF, and WebP formats. Maximum 12 files, each up to 5MB.
